title: (x) The Palladium, NYC logo Art Deco display sans - Boul Mich {Akira}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706174828im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Palladium%20logo_3620.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Empire Magazine nameplate - (based on) Relay {Stephen}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706174828/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42495 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Lined Bauhaus-style sans on Glam Rock album cover- Pump Triline {Jan E} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706174828/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42717 "Go to next forum topic")
author: stealyourboognish

comments.content:
A very similar (almost identical) font is called ’Atlas’. It’s a free font, but I’m not sure whereI got it from. If you Google it, using ’art deco’ and ’font’ it should be easy to find.

JH

A very similar (almost identical) font is called ’Atlas’. It’s a free font, but I’m not sure where I got it from. If you Google it, using ’art deco’ and ’font’ it should be easy to find.

JH

[Atlas Triline](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706174828/http:/www.fontbros.com/cgi-bin/commerce.cgi?preadd=action&key=HAFO-ATLA) and [Atlas Solid](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706174828/http:/www.fontbros.com/cgi-bin/commerce.cgi?preadd=action&key=HAFO-ATSO) by Harold’s Fonts now available at Font Bros
